code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Container}from'./App.styles';import{Section}from'../Section/Section';import{Feedback}from'../Feedback/Feedback';import{Statistics}from'../Statistics/Staticstics';import{Notification}from'../Notification/Notification';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const App=()=>{const[feedback,setFeedback]=useState({good:0,neutral:0,bad:0});const onLeaveFeedback=type=>{setFeedback(prevFeedback=>({...prevFeedback,[type]:prevFeedback[type]+1}));};const countTotalFeedback=()=>{return feedback.good+feedback.neutral+feedback.bad;};const countPositiveFeedbackPercentage=()=>{const total=countTotalFeedback();return total>0?Math.round(feedback.good/total*100):0;};const{good,neutral,bad}=feedback;const totalFeedback=countTotalFeedback();const positivePercentage=countPositiveFeedbackPercentage();const options=Object.keys(feedback);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Section,{title:"Please leave feedback",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Feedback,{onLeaveFeedback:onLeaveFeedback,options:options})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Section,{title:"Statistics",children:totalFeedback!==0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Statistics,{good:good,neutral:neutral,bad:bad,total:totalFeedback,positivePercentage:positivePercentage}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Notification,{message:"There is no feedback"})})]});};
